# 男人真相

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/nanren-zhenxiang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/nanren-zhenxiang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install nanren-zhenxiang
nanren-zhenxiang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g nanren-zhenxiang
nanren-zhenxiang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
